419880.name: Robotpencil Presents: The Soldier
419880.description:
Almost 2 hours of video content about how to integrate a 3D Zbrush model, import into keyshot and render it to match photo back-plates lighting and tone. This video is for intermediate users of Zbrush, Keyshot, and Photoshop. If you are a beginner, I recommend getting comfortable with these software before buying this video.

Content:
  • 3 videos, one on Zbrush, Keyshot, and Photoshop

Download from your Software Library
  • Zbrush Ztool
  • Keyshot Project File
  • PSD/JPG
  • OBJ's of each piece.
If you received this as a gift, click here to add The Soldier downloads to your software Library.
